== Kunjathur (CT) (627121) ==

Kunjathur (CT) is a town in the [[Kasaragod]] taluka of [[Kasaragod]] district with an area of 12.65 sq. km. and harbouring 2634 households with total population of 13633 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kasaragod]] is at a distance of 35 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 660 km. Male population is 6729 and female population is 6904. Scheduled Caste population is 197 and Scheduled Tribes population is 260. Census Location Code of the town is 627121<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Mangalore(m corp. + og) at a distance of 15 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 205 km. Railway station is at Manjeshwar at a distance of 3 km.
